text:
What's up everyone? Today we're learning
English with Will Smith

in the classic 90's show, The Fresh Prince
of Bel-Air.

In case you're new here, I want to let
you know that we are here to help you
learn fast English without getting lost,

without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles.

Just like Alexa who says that
our channel is super informative.

So don't forget to hit that Subscribe
button and the Bell down below,

so that you don't miss a single one of
our new lessons.

Do you want to understand natives
even when we speak fast?

Then our Fluent with Friends course
is perfect for you!
In this 48-week course you will learn

with the first two seasons of Friends.
You'll receive pdf power lessons every week,

vocabulary memorization software,
access to our Fluency Circle Global community,

and so much more.
And the best part is

you can try it right now for FREE with
our 3-Part Masterclass!

All you have to do is click up here or
down in the description box below
to learn more and sign up now for free.

If you're enjoying this lesson and are a
fan of Will Smith,

like I am, then why not check out
our Will Smith playlist.

We have so many great lessons for
you to watch there,

so you can click up here or down in the description
box below to choose your next lesson.
